column5: 2 bedroom, 2 bath accommodation has a king size bed, queen size bed, and 2 twin rollaways. Great for families or girlfriend getaways! The leather couch and chair and a half in the living room offer lots of room to stretch out and watch TV. A personal hospitality bar has a toaster oven, microwave, bar sink and refrigerator. Across the hall you'll find the second bedroom and bathroom along with a sitting area and full kitchen. The gas grill on the party deck is also available for your use.
